alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; DeSoto; Hardee; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 16 at 8:58AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Highlands, eastern Hardee, eastern Charlotte, southeastern Polk, eastern DeSoto and Lee Counties through 945 AM EST... At 858 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Poinciana to Cape Coral. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Lake Wales, Sebring, Avon Park, Lake Placid, Lehigh Acres, Lake Istokpoga, Palmona Park, Southwest Florida Airport, Harlem Heights, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Babcock Webb Wma, Cypress Lake, McGregor, Babcock Ranch, Pine Manor, Olga, Venus and Buckingham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; DeSoto; Hardee; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee; Polk
